nodes.beat: Red, an eco-conscious girl living in a city powered by renewable energy, receives a video call from her sick grandmother.
Grandmother requests Red to bring her some organic medicines from the city's green market.
Red, wearing her red hoodie, ventures out on her solar-powered bicycle.
En route, Red encounters a stranger, a cunning industrialist, who learns about her mission.
The industrialist manipulates the city's traffic signals to mislead Red.
Misled, Red ends up in a polluted industrial area.
Realizing the trick, Red uses her knowledge to expose the industrialist's pollution to the city's environmental department.
Red continues her journey to her grandmother's house after the industrialist is arrested.
Red delivers the medicines and they have a virtual family gathering via video call.
Grandmother asks Red to bring her a rare plant from the city's botanical garden.
The industrialist tries to destroy the rare plant to build a factory.
Red, noticing the industrialist's intentions, rallies the city's green community to protect the plant.
Together, they stop the industrialist and save the plant.
Red brings the plant to her grandmother who uses it to heal.
Red, a climate activist, plans a city-wide clean-up campaign.
Red's campaign attracts the attention of a greedy industrialist.
The industrialist tries to sabotage the campaign by spreading misinformation.
The industrialist tries to buy the botanical garden to build a factory.
Red, noticing the industrialist's intentions, rallies the city's green community to protect the garden.
Together, they stop the industrialist and save the botanical garden.
